00056 bool hql_needs_quotes(const char *name) {
00057   if (!isalpha(*name))
00058     return true;
00059   else {
00060     for (; *name; name++) {
00061       if (!isalnum(*name)) {
00062         return true;
00063       }
00064     }
00065   }
00066   return false;
00067 }

00074 Schema::Schema(bool read_ids)
00075   : m_error_string(), m_next_column_id(0), m_access_group_map(),
00076     m_column_family_map(), m_generation(1), m_access_groups(),
00077     m_open_access_group(0), m_open_column_family(0), m_read_ids(read_ids),
00078     m_output_ids(false), m_max_column_family_id(0) {
00079 }

00081 
00082 Schema::~Schema() {
00083   foreach(AccessGroup *ag, m_access_groups)
00084     delete ag;
00085   foreach(ColumnFamily *cf, m_column_families)
00086     delete cf;
00087 }

00090 Schema *Schema::new_instance(const char *buf, int len, bool read_ids) {
00091   ScopedLock lock(ms_mutex);
00092   XML_Parser parser = XML_ParserCreate("US-ASCII");
00093 
00094   XML_SetElementHandler(parser, &start_element_handler, &end_element_handler);
00095   XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, &character_data_handler);
00096 
00097   ms_schema = new Schema(read_ids);
00098 
00099   if (XML_Parse(parser, buf, len, 1) == 0) {
00100     String errstr = (String)"Schema Parse Error: "
00101         + (const char *)XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser))
00102         + " line " + (int)XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser) + ", offset "
00103         + (int)XML_GetCurrentByteIndex(parser);
00104     ms_schema->set_error_string(errstr);
00105   }
00106 
00107   XML_ParserFree(parser);
00108 
00109   Schema *schema = ms_schema;
00110   ms_schema = 0;
00111   return schema;
00112 }

00114 
00117 void Schema::start_element_handler(void *userdata,
00118                          const XML_Char *name,
00119                          const XML_Char **atts) {
00120   int i;
00121 
00122   if (!strcasecmp(name, "Schema")) {
00123     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00124       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00125         return;
00126       if (ms_schema->m_read_ids && !strcasecmp(atts[i], "generation"))
00127         ms_schema->set_generation(atts[i+1]);
00128       else if (!strcasecmp(atts[i], "compressor"))
00129         ms_schema->set_compressor((String)atts[i+1]);
00130       else
00131         ms_schema->set_error_string((String)"Unrecognized 'Schema' attribute : "
00132                                      + atts[i]);
00133     }
00134   }
00135   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "AccessGroup")) {
00136     ms_schema->open_access_group();
00137     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00138       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00139         return;
00140       ms_schema->set_access_group_parameter(atts[i], atts[i+1]);
00141     }
00142   }
00143   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "ColumnFamily")) {
00144     ms_schema->open_column_family();
00145     for (i=0; atts[i] != 0; i+=2) {
00146       if (atts[i+1] == 0)
00147         return;
00148       ms_schema->set_column_family_parameter(atts[i], atts[i+1]);
00149     }
00150   }
00151   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "MaxVersions") || !strcasecmp(name, "ttl")
00152            || !strcasecmp(name, "Name"))
00153     ms_collected_text = "";
00154   else
00155     ms_schema->set_error_string(format("Unrecognized element - '%s'", name));
00156 
00157   return;
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 void Schema::end_element_handler(void *userdata, const XML_Char *name) {
00162   if (!strcasecmp(name, "AccessGroup"))
00163     ms_schema->close_access_group();
00164   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "ColumnFamily"))
00165     ms_schema->close_column_family();
00166   else if (!strcasecmp(name, "MaxVersions") || !strcasecmp(name, "ttl")
00167            || !strcasecmp(name, "Name")) {
00168     boost::trim(ms_collected_text);
00169     ms_schema->set_column_family_parameter(name, ms_collected_text.c_str());
00170   }
00171 }

00175 void
00176 Schema::character_data_handler(void *userdata, const XML_Char *s, int len) {
00177   ms_collected_text.assign(s, len);
00178 }

00182 void Schema::open_access_group() {
00183   if (m_open_access_group != 0)
00184     set_error_string((string)"Nested AccessGroup elements not allowed");
00185   else {
00186     m_open_access_group = new AccessGroup();
00187   }
00188 }
00189 
00190 
00191 
00192 void Schema::close_access_group() {
00193   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00194     set_error_string((string)"Unable to close locality group, not open");
00195   else {
00196     if (m_open_access_group->name == "")
00197       set_error_string("Name attribute required for all AccessGroup elements");
00198     else {
00199       if (m_access_group_map.find(m_open_access_group->name)
00200           != m_access_group_map.end())
00201         set_error_string((String)"Multiply defined locality group '"
00202                           + m_open_access_group->name + "'");
00203       else {
00204         m_access_group_map[m_open_access_group->name] = m_open_access_group;
00205         m_access_groups.push_back(m_open_access_group);
00206       }
00207     }
00208     m_open_access_group = 0;
00209   }
00210 }
00211 
00212 
00213 
00214 void Schema::open_column_family() {
00215   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00216     set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily defined outside of AccessGroup");
00217   else {
00218     if (m_open_column_family != 0)
00219       set_error_string((string)"Nested ColumnFamily elements not allowed");
00220     else {
00221       m_open_column_family = new ColumnFamily();
00222       m_open_column_family->id = 0;
00223       m_open_column_family->max_versions = 0;
00224       m_open_column_family->ttl = 0;
00225       m_open_column_family->ag = m_open_access_group->name;
00226     }
00227   }
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 
00232 void Schema::close_column_family() {
00233   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00234     set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily defined outside of AccessGroup");
00235   else if (m_open_column_family == 0)
00236     set_error_string((string)"Unable to close column family, not open");
00237   else {
00238     if (m_open_column_family->name == "")
00239       set_error_string((string)"ColumnFamily must have Name child element");
00240     else if (m_read_ids && m_open_column_family->id == 0) {
00241       set_error_string((String)"No id specifid for ColumnFamily '"
00242                         + m_open_column_family->name + "'");
00243     }
00244     else {
00245       if (m_column_family_map.find(m_open_column_family->name)
00246           != m_column_family_map.end())
00247         set_error_string((string)"Multiply defined column families '"
00248                           + m_open_column_family->name + "'");
00249       else {
00250         m_column_family_map[m_open_column_family->name] = m_open_column_family;
00251         if (m_read_ids)
00252           m_column_family_id_map[m_open_column_family->id] =
00253               m_open_column_family;
00254         m_open_access_group->columns.push_back(m_open_column_family);
00255         m_column_families.push_back(m_open_column_family);
00256       }
00257       m_open_column_family = 0;
00258     }
00259   }
00260 }

00263 
00264 void Schema::set_access_group_parameter(const char *param, const char *value) {
00265   if (m_open_access_group == 0)
00266     set_error_string((String)"Unable to set AccessGroup attribute '" + param
00267                       + "', locality group not open");
00268   else {
00269     if (!strcasecmp(param, "name"))
00270       m_open_access_group->name = value;
00271     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "inMemory")) {
00272       if (!strcasecmp(value, "true") || !strcmp(value, "1"))
00273         m_open_access_group->in_memory = true;
00274       else if (!strcasecmp(value, "false") || !strcmp(value, "0"))
00275         m_open_access_group->in_memory = false;
00276       else
00277         set_error_string((String)"Invalid value (" + value
00278                           + ") for AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00279     }
00280     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "blksz")) {
00281       long long blocksize = strtoll(value, 0, 10);
00282       if (blocksize == 0 || blocksize >= 4294967296LL)
00283         set_error_string((String)"Invalid value (" + value
00284                           + ") for AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00285       else
00286         m_open_access_group->blocksize = (uint32_t)blocksize;
00287     }
00288     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "compressor")) {
00289       m_open_access_group->compressor = value;
00290       boost::trim(m_open_access_group->compressor);
00291     }
00292     else
00293       set_error_string((string)"Invalid AccessGroup attribute '" + param + "'");
00294   }
00295 }

00298 
00299 void Schema::set_column_family_parameter(const char *param, const char *value) {
00300   if (m_open_column_family == 0)
00301     set_error_string((String)"Unable to set ColumnFamily parameter '" + param
00302                       + "', column family not open");
00303   else {
00304     if (!strcasecmp(param, "Name"))
00305       m_open_column_family->name = value;
00306     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "ttl")) {
00307       long long secs = strtoll(value, 0, 10);
00308       m_open_column_family->ttl = (time_t)secs;
00309     }
00310     else if (!strcasecmp(param, "MaxVersions")) {
00311       m_open_column_family->max_versions = atoi(value);
00312       if (m_open_column_family->max_versions == 0)
00313         set_error_string((String)"Invalid value (" + value
00314                           + ") for MaxVersions");
00315     }
00316     else if (m_read_ids && !strcasecmp(param, "id")) {
00317       m_open_column_family->id = atoi(value);
00318       if (m_open_column_family->id == 0)
00319         set_error_string((String)"Invalid value (" + value
00320                           + ") for ColumnFamily id attribute");
00321       if (m_open_column_family->id > m_max_column_family_id)
00322         m_max_column_family_id = m_open_column_family->id;
00323     }
00324     else
00325       set_error_string(format("Invalid ColumnFamily parameter '%s'", param));
00326   }
00327 }

00329 
00330 void Schema::assign_ids() {
00331   m_max_column_family_id = 0;
00332 
00333   foreach(ColumnFamily *cf, m_column_families)
00334     cf->id = ++m_max_column_family_id;
00335 
00336   m_generation = 1;
00337   m_output_ids=true;
00338 }

00340 
00341 void Schema::render(String &output) {
00342   if (!is_valid()) {
00343     output = m_error_string;
00344     return;
00345   }
00346   output += "<Schema";
00347 
00348   if (m_output_ids)
00349     output += format(" generation=\"%d\"", m_generation);
00350 
00351   if (m_compressor != "")
00352     output += format(" compressor=\"%s\"", m_compressor.c_str());
00353 
00354   output += ">\n";
00355 
00356   foreach(const AccessGroup *ag, m_access_groups) {
00357     output += format("  <AccessGroup name=\"%s\"", ag->name.c_str());
00358 
00359     if (ag->in_memory)
00360       output += " inMemory=\"true\"";
00361 
00362     if (ag->blocksize > 0)
00363       output += format(" blksz=\"%u\"", ag->blocksize);
00364 
00365     if (ag->compressor != "")
00366       output += format(" compressor=\"%s\"", ag->compressor.c_str());
00367 
00368     output += ">\n";
00369 
00370     foreach(const ColumnFamily *cf, ag->columns) {
00371       output += "    <ColumnFamily";
00372 
00373       if (m_output_ids)
00374         output += format(" id=\"%u\"", cf->id);
00375 
00376       output += ">\n";
00377       output += format("      <Name>%s</Name>\n", cf->name.c_str());
00378 
00379       if (cf->max_versions != 0)
00380         output += format("      <MaxVersions>%u</MaxVersions>\n",
00381                          cf->max_versions);
00382 
00383       if (cf->ttl != 0)
00384         output += format("      <ttl>%d</ttl>\n", (int)cf->ttl);
00385 
00386       output += "    </ColumnFamily>\n";
00387     }
00388     output += "  </AccessGroup>\n";
00389   }
00390   output += "</Schema>\n";
00391 }
00392 
00393 void Schema::render_hql_create_table(const String &table_name, String &output) {
00394   output += "\n";
00395   output += "CREATE TABLE ";
00396 
00397   if (m_compressor != "")
00398     output += format("COMPRESSOR=\"%s\"", m_compressor.c_str());
00399 
00400   output += table_name + " (\n";
00401 
00402   foreach(const ColumnFamily *cf, m_column_families) {
00403     // check to see if column family name needs quotes around it
00404     if (hql_needs_quotes(cf->name.c_str()))
00405       output += format("  '%s'", cf->name.c_str());
00406     else
00407       output += format("  %s", cf->name.c_str());
00408 
00409     if (cf->max_versions != 0)
00410       output += format(" MAX_VERSIONS=%u", cf->max_versions);
00411 
00412     if (cf->ttl != 0)
00413       output += format(" TTL=%d", (int)cf->ttl);
00414 
00415     output += ",\n";
00416   }
00417   size_t i = 1;
00418 
00419   foreach(const AccessGroup *ag, m_access_groups) {
00420     output += "  ACCESS GROUP ";
00421 
00422     if (hql_needs_quotes(ag->name.c_str()))
00423       output += format("'%s'", ag->name.c_str());
00424     else
00425       output += ag->name;
00426 
00427     if (ag->in_memory)
00428       output += " IN_MEMORY";
00429 
00430     if (ag->blocksize != 0)
00431       output += format(" BLOCKSIZE=%u", ag->blocksize);
00432 
00433     if (ag->compressor != "")
00434       output += format(" COMPRESSOR=\"%s\"", ag->compressor.c_str());
00435 
00436     if (!ag->columns.empty()) {
00437       bool display_comma = false;
00438       output += " (";
00439 
00440       foreach(const ColumnFamily *cf, ag->columns) {
00441         // check to see if column family name needs quotes around it
00442         if (display_comma)
00443           output += ", ";
00444         else
00445           display_comma = true;
00446 
00447         if (hql_needs_quotes(cf->name.c_str()))
00448           output += format("'%s'", cf->name.c_str());
00449         else
00450           output += cf->name;
00451       }
00452       output += ")";
00453     }
00454     output += i == m_access_groups.size() ? "\n" : ",\n";
00455   }
00456   output += ")\n";
00457 }

00464 bool Schema::is_valid() {
00465   if (get_error_string() != 0)
00466     return false;
00467   return true;
00468 }

00473 void Schema::set_generation(const char *generation) {
00474   int gen_num = atoi(generation);
00475   if (gen_num <= 0)
00476     set_error_string((String)"Invalid Table 'generation' value (" + generation
00477                       + ")");
00478   m_generation = gen_num;
00479 }

00481 
00482 void Schema::add_access_group(AccessGroup *ag) {
00483   pair<AccessGroupMap::iterator, bool> res =
00484       m_access_group_map.insert(make_pair(ag->name, ag));
00485 
00486   if (!res.second) {
00487     m_error_string = String("Access group '") + ag->name + "' multiply defined";
00488     delete ag;
00489     return;
00490   }
00491   m_access_groups.push_back(ag);
00492 }
00493 
00494 void Schema::add_column_family(ColumnFamily *cf) {
00495   pair<ColumnFamilyMap::iterator, bool> res =
00496       m_column_family_map.insert(make_pair(cf->name, cf));
00497 
00498   if (!res.second) {
00499     m_error_string = format("Column family '%s' multiply defined",
00500                             cf->name.c_str());
00501     delete cf;
00502     return;
00503   }
00504 
00505   AccessGroupMap::const_iterator ag_iter = m_access_group_map.find(cf->ag);
00506 
00507   if (ag_iter == m_access_group_map.end()) {
00508     m_error_string = String("Invalid access group '") + cf->ag
00509         + "' for column family '" + cf->name + "'";
00510     delete cf;
00511     return;
00512   }
00513 
00514   m_column_families.push_back(cf);
00515   ag_iter->second->columns.push_back(cf);
00516 }
